title: Did not get chest loot
body: I had got a chest from a s- minus game, and when I had opened the chest, I got 150 orange essence and it showed the project ekko skin and I did not get the skin. One weird thing is that it did not say the skin name either.

replies.body: Looking into this for you, it looks like you received a Project Ekko Icon.  This was instantly unlocked, so you will find it in your icon selection pane.  Congrats!
Ok that must have been it, it did not say what it was, so thought it was the skin. Thank you very much.
